website_summaries.verdict: A powerful gas-powered edger by a trusted name in lawn care that has the features and build to tackle edging projects and other yard jobs for a professional look.
pros: Versatile, as it has a 6-position depth selector
Rugged 140 cc engine by Briggs & Stratton
Adjustable wheels can easily travel over various surfaces, thanks to the adjustable curb hop feature
Includes a trencher kit that comes in handy for numerous yard and landscaping tasks
cons: Has some plastic components that feel flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Nice edger that works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: It's a greated edger and wish that it didn't take 4 or 5 pulls to start. In use, it starts again with a single pull.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Holdeman

customer_reviews.title: High Expectations Low reality
customer_reviews.text: I have used it one time and now oil is running out underneath it!
customer_reviews.author: David Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This machine is underpowered when at it's deepest two settings.
customer_reviews.author: james wirth

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Rubbish says this edger is trash
customer_reviews.text: No throttle or brake on blade, has hard time starting like others have said.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Box came as rip open with sealing tape around. Will start assembly on weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Mahendra Patel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet has assembly instructions and diagrams are vague
customer_reviews.author: Donald Mumm

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome lots of POWER. Blows dewalts electric edger away. Don't buy electric edgers they simply don't hold up. I bought one and learned the hard way gas is the only way to go. I didn't buy it through amazon I found it at lowes for a great price and couldn't pass it up.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Crocs?
customer_reviews.text: Who provided the video on YouTube regarding this product. I don’t think I’d be wearing Crocs when running this machine. With that said, why would I trust any individual wearing crocs giving a ‘how to’ on this machinery. Just like YouTube and amazon, untrustworthy.
customer_reviews.author: breadman391

customer_reviews.title: Best edger for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this edger through a home improvement store and have loved it since day one. I cuts a nice clean edge and powers it’s way through dirt and grass.
customer_reviews.author: Brad & Heather

customer_reviews.title: Buy extra belts.
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine from Lowes last week. After one heavy use, I'm hear to order another belt.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

product_meta.title: Troy-Bilt 140cc Briggs and Stratton OHV 550e series Engine Push Lawn Edger
product_meta.description: Our Troy-Bilt gas powered lawn edgers help you get a perfectly clean edge along driveways and beds. The heavy duty construction and powerful engine keep our lawn edgers going. This Troy-Bilt Deluxe gas edger will answer all your edging needs this season. Powered by a 140cc Briggs & Stratton OHV engine, this edger will stay strong year after year. Equipped with a 9-inch heavy duty, self-sharpening blade for ultimate performance. The 3-position adjustable bevel makes it easy to edge along walkways and flower beds. Troy-Bilt offers a 2-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: This Troy-Bilt Deluxe Gas Powered Edger can help you get a perfectly clean edge along driveways and beds this season
Operates with a powerful 140cc Briggs & Stratton OHV gas engine
Equipped with a 9-inch heavy duty, self-sharpening blade
A 3-position adjustable bevel for easy edging along walkways and flower beds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.8 out of 5 stars17 ratings2.8 out of 5 stars
